About the Company: Wheels India Ltd engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of automobile wheels in India. The product range of the company includes Wheels for Heavy Vehicles (Trucks, Buses, Light Commercial Vehicles, Trailers, Tippers etc.).Wheels for Light Vehicles (Passenger Cars, Mini Vans, SUVs & MUVs).Wheels for Agricultural Applications (Tractors, Combines, Farm Equipments etc.).Wheels for Off-Road Construction Equipments.Wire Wheels (For Contemporary & Classic Cars, MUVs & SUVs). Air Suspension.
